structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.catch_line: Approaches to be kept in repair by owner or tenant.

text.section: The owner or tenant of lands fronting on a public road shall construct and keep in repair all approaches or driveways to and from the public road under the direction of the county engineer.
No owner or tenant shall fill up any ditch or place anything in any ditch so as to interfere with the purposes for which it was made.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4356b.
